Description_lang: $?c1[When your Magi's Spark explodes, you conjure $s1 Arcane Splinters][Consuming Winter's Chill with Glacial Spike conjures $s2 additional Frost Splinters].

description_blz.en_US: When your Magi's Spark explodes, you conjure 6 Arcane Splinters.
description_blz.es_MX: Cuando tu Chispa del Magi explota, conjuras 6 Astillas arcanas.
description_blz.pt_BR: Quando sua Centelha dos Magos explode, você conjura 6 Farpas Arcanas.
description_blz.de_DE: Wenn Euer 'Funke der Magi' explodiert, beschwört Ihr 6 arkane Splitter.
description_blz.en_GB: When your Magi's Spark explodes, you conjure 6 Arcane Splinters.
description_blz.es_ES: Cuando explota tu Chispa de magi, conjuras 6 astillas Arcanas.
description_blz.fr_FR: Lorsque votre Étincelle des magi explose, vous invoquez 6 fragments arcaniques.
description_blz.it_IT: Quando la Scintilla del Magus esplode, si evocano 6 Schegge Arcane.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда ваша "Искра мага" взрывается, вы призываете 6 чародейских обломков.
description_blz.ko_KR: 마도사의 불꽃이 폭발할 때 비전 쇄편 6개를 생성합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 當你的魔導師火花爆炸時，你會召喚6個秘法裂片。
description_blz.zh_CN: 当你的大法师的火花效果结束时，你会召唤6个奥术裂片。
